author: mapellidario
body:
### status

ready to merge, [tested](https://github.com/dmwm/CRABServer/issues/7105) in preprod (`cmsweb-testbed` for crabserver, crab-preprod-tw01 for taskworker and publisher).

### description

After having merged the branch `python3` into `master`, we switched back to the old format for tags: `v3.YYMMDD` will be used for images with python3 environment, which is the new default.

This change required to remove the `if` switches in `crab(server|taskworker).spec` to differentiate the build of py2 images form the one of py3 images. 

While doing it, I took the chance to remove patches that I think are not used anymore. This is my opinion, i tested it and no problem occurred. However, i may have overlooked something, so please add your feedback if you think that those `.patch` files are still needed!


fyi: @belforte
title: crab. py3-only specfiles, removing unused .patch files.
